briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy of Pirfenidone in Patients With Idiopathic Pulmonary Fibrosis
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo Controlled, Phase 3 Study of the Safety and Efficacy of Pirfenidone in Patients With Idiopathic Pulmonary Fibrosis
summary: The purposes of this study are to assess the efficacy of treatment with pirfenidone 2403 milligrams per day compared with placebo in patients with idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis (IPF)and to assess the safety of treatment with pirfenidone 2403 milligrams per day compared with placebo in patients with idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis.

primaryOutcome.measure: Absolute Change in Percent Predicted Forced Vital Capacity(FVC)
